summary: Outlier Ventures CEO Jamie Burke discusses the current state of the metaverse and the potential of Web3 infrastructure for AI development.
title: Web3 may help AI scale, says Outlier Ventures CEO
content: Episode 53 of Season 5 of The Scoop was recorded with The Block's Frank Chaparro and Outlier Ventures Founder and CEO Jamie Burke.
Listen below, and subscribe to The Scoop on Apple, Spotify, Google Podcasts, Stitcher, or wherever you listen to podcasts. Please send feedback and revision requests to [email protected].
<iframe frameborder="0" height="200" src="https://playlist.megaphone.fm/?e=BLOCK5517241153" width="100%" data-v-f87c67ca=""></iframe>

Jamie Burke is the Founder and CEO of Outlier Ventures — a Web3 accelerator program for projects that align with Outlier's vision for an open metaverse. Despite adverse market conditions, Outlier Ventures assisted 89 Web3 startups in 2022.
In this episode, Burke examines the state of the metaverse today and explains how Web3 infrastructure can enhance AI's development and scale.
